summary: A new `UniformArmorVariantsByRankPage.tsx` page was added and routed to `/lore`, and it appears to include Section II content and copper-themed Card-based styling. However, the diff is truncated and does not provide enough evidence to confirm that all required ranks, exact bullet items (including punctuation/quoted terms), and all Section III required text/subheadings are fully and exactly implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render Section II "II. Uniform & Armor Variants by Rank" with all nine ranks in the specified order and with the exact provided bullet items (including exact punctuation/terms like "T-10A", "T-1", "T-3").
missing_requirements.reason: The added page shows the Section II heading and partial content for High Conductor and Conductor, but the file is truncated, so there is no complete evidence that all nine ranks (through Copper-Bearer) are rendered in the required order and that every bullet item exactly matches the provided lists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add Section III "III. Copper War–Era Rank Structure" including the exact introductory sentence, a visible "New / Temporary Ranks" subheading, and the five war-era ranks in order with exact bullet items (including "T-10B" and quotation marks around “Breaker”).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary claims Section III exists, but the actual `UniformArmorVariantsByRankPage.tsx` content is truncated before any Section III text appears, so the required heading, exact intro sentence, subheading, ranks, and exact bullets cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added decorative iconography/hero presentation (e.g., lucide-react Shield/Zap icons and a hero section) on the Uniform & Armor Variants by Rank page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on adding Sections II and III content and specifies layout constraints, but does not request adding new icon-based hero UI elements. This may be acceptable stylistically, but it is additional unrequested functionality/UI.
